OOC: Cool of Legendarynemasis. He's new, and it takes a while to get the
rules, you above all should know that. Now you said that your a hot
head, so you should know it's not smart to go off yelling at people.
Kyle, don't worry, everyone's moded once or twice, but we've just
learned from our mistake. Again, talk to the council. Also, welcome to
the RPG :)
